overview: When a young actor feels he's being unfairly typecast, he decides to break his good guy image and star in a porno. That's the scoop behind this outrageous comedy featuring former child star Scotty Schwartz (The Toy, A Christmas Story). Lots of hot sex, including an orgy, a hot rooftop encounter and Scotty in a tender love scene with the beautiful Juli Ashton.
title: Scotty's X-Rated Adventure
